name: Harmas
full_text: SIZE One size (circumference approx. 69 cm / 27.5”, height approx. 44 cm / 17.5”) YARN 2 skeins of Isokummun Kehräämö Täppä (100% Kainuugrey wool; 275m 300yds per 100g), OR approx. 380m / 416yds of heavy fingering / sport weight yarn. NEEDLES 3mm US 2 ½ , 40 cm / 16" long. NOTE: always use the needle size that gives you the correct gauge. GAUGE 23.5 sts & 30 rnds = 10 cm / 4" in lace pattern, after blocking. NOTIONS 1 Stitch marker, Tapestry needle for Weaving in the ends. ————————————— SIZE One size (circumference approx. 69 cm & height approx. 44 cm) YARN 2 skeins of Isokummun Kehräämö Täppä (100% Kainunuhanmas wool; 275m per 100g), OR approx. 380m of heavy fingering / sport strong yarn. NEEDLES 3mm circular needles, 40 cm long. NOTE: always use the needle size that gives you the required density. KNIT DENSITY 23.5 sts & 30 rows = 10 cm of lace, after pressing. OTHER ACCESSORIES 1 loop marker, a finishing needle for finishing thread ends.
